alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 1:40PM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 7500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Kaibab Plateau above 7500 feet, including the Grand Canyon North Rim and Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Jacob Lake 1 to 2 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
